* dynamic
	EXTRA_CFLAGS += -DDEBUG
	ccflags-y := -DDEBUG
	
* early_printk
	init/main.c
	pr_notice("Kernel command line: %s\n", boot_command_line);

	assemble	
		arch/arm/include/debug/imx.S
			.macro  addruart, rp, rv, tmp
			ldr \rp, =UART_PADDR    @ physical
			ldr \rv, =UART_VADDR    @ virtual
			.endm
	
		arch/arm/kernel/head.S
			277 #ifdef CONFIG_DEBUG_LL
			278 #if !defined(CONFIG_DEBUG_ICEDCC) && !defined(CONFIG_DEBUG_SEMIHOSTING)
			279     /*
			280      * Map in IO space for serial debugging.
			281      * This allows debug messages to be output
			282      * via a serial console before paging_init.
			283      */
			284     addruart r7, r3, r0
			285 
			286     mov r3, r3, lsr #SECTION_SHIFT
			287     mov r3, r3, lsl #PMD_ORDER
			288 
			289     add r0, r4, r3
			290     mov r3, r7, lsr #SECTION_SHIFT
			291     ldr r7, [r10, #PROCINFO_IO_MMUFLAGS] @ io_mmuflags
			292     orr r3, r7, r3, lsl #SECTION_SHIFT
	
		DEBUG_UART_PHYS
		arch/arm/Kconfig.debug:1336
		DEBUG_UART_8250_SHIFT
		DEBUG_UART_8250_WORD
		DEBUG_UART_8250
		
		arch/arm/Kconfig.debug->
			1271 config DEBUG_LL_INCLUDE ->选择debug.S的汇编文件
					......
					default "debug/omap2plus.S" if DEBUG_OMAP2PLUS_UART
						1336 config DEBUG_UART_PHYS
							default 0x00100a00 if DEBUG_NETX_UART ->设置debug的PHY 地址
						1442 config DEBUG_UART_VIRT
							default 0xe0000a00 if DEBUG_NETX_UART

* cmdline
* [[usedebug]]
* [[kernel-core-dump]]
* [[exception_debug]]
